Integrations in HACS (or custom_components as they are often referred to) are community-built integrations.

Special notes about Integrations

:::info When you download, update or remove an integration in HACS, you need to restart Home Assistant. :::

:::tip You may need to clear your browser cache before you see it in the "+" list.

Note that this only applies for the initial download of that Integration, if you update it, you still need to restart Home Assistant before it loads the new files. :::

Integrations download location

Any Integration you download with HACS is stored in custom_components/ in your Home Assistant configuration directory.
